metadata.instruction: WHAT DO WE ASSUME TO START A PROOF BY CONTRADICTION?
distractors: \text{Assume } p \text{ and } q \text{ are both divisible by 3}
allOptions: Assume p and q are both divisible by 3
metadata.explanation: To prove by contradiction, we assume √3 IS rational: √3 = p/q where p and q are coprime (lowest terms).
